attributes.action: Make all Taxis carry a working credit/debit card machine.
attributes.background: This will make Taxi rides more traceable, more convenient than carrying cash, help counter a rise in on line companies like UBER and the money leaving the country, avoid tax evasion in this country, stop illegal taxi drivers from operating.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.  

Licensing conditions for taxis in England are set by local authorities, or in London by the Mayor of London. You may wish to consider contacting your local authority or starting a petition if they provide a local e-petitions system.
